content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
    /* --> place the keys that you see in JSON documents in the WITH clause:
    , JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.key1') AS header1
    , JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.key2') AS header2
    */
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://demostorageacctgm.dfs.core.windows.net/files/ecdc_cases.jsonl',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        -- FIELDQUOTE and FIELDTERMINATOR are set to 0x0b as we do not expect to find it in the file.
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        line varchar(max)
    ) AS [result]
